films.title: Arze
films.description: To find her stolen scooter, Arze drags her rebellious son on an adventurous journey across Beirut, navigating the city's web of sectarianism with wit and courage while revealing to her son a long- overdue family secret.

films.title: 52 Blue
films.description: After 12 years of enduring his father's isolating control on a remote island home in Kochi, India, with his mother's support and lessons, Ashish breaks free. Embarking on a journey to meet his idol, Messi, at the World Cup in Qatar 2022, leading him to face himself and the world for the first time.

films.title: Goodbye Julia
films.description: Wracked by guilt after covering up a murder, Mona — a northern Sudanese retired singer in a tense marriage — tries to make amends by taking in the deceased's southern Sudanese widow, Julia, and her son, Daniel, into her home. Unable to confess her transgressions to Julia, Mona decides to leave the past behind and adjust to a new status quo, unaware that the country's turmoil may find its way into her home and put her face with her sins.

films.title: Captains of Zaatari
films.description: Two best friends trapped in the Zaatari Refugee Camp in Jordan have an undying dream of becoming professional football players. When a world-renowned sports academy visits the camp, the boys finally have a chance to make this dream come true.
